meanings.definition: Of or relating to the summit
meanings.sent1: The climbers reached the summital peak after a long journey.
meanings.sent2: The flag fluttered proudly at the summital point of the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The summital view was so breathtaking that it made the hikers gasp in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her achievements in the project were at a summital level compared to her peers.
meanings.sent5: The golden sunrise painted the summital rocks with a warm glow.

meanings.definition: Located at or forming the summit
meanings.sent1: The summital hut provided shelter for tired hikers at the top.
meanings.sent2: The birds chirped happily in the summital trees.
meanings.sent3: The summital clouds seemed to play hide and seek with the sun.
meanings.sent4: The summital flag waved proudly in the wind, signaling victory.
meanings.sent5: The summital snow glistened under the bright sun, creating a dazzling sight.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the highest point or top
meanings.sent1: The climber secured his gear at the summital edge of the cliff.
meanings.sent2: The castle stood tall on the summital hill, overlooking the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The summital flowers bloomed brightly, attracting bees and butterflies.
meanings.sent4: Her joy reached a summital level when she received the award.
meanings.sent5: The summital stars twinkled in the night sky, guiding the lost travelers.
